Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Classes
com.conceptwave.scripting.CwInterfacePort
          As of 6.0. Functionality replaced by CW Queues. 
 

Deprecated Fields
com.conceptwave.scripting.Process.currentActivity
          As of 4.2. The activity that executes the script is 'this' object in the script. No substitution is provided. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Finder.items
          As of 4.1. Use 'list' method to get the finder result set. The method will be removed in version 6.0 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Controller.metadataType
          As of 5.1.12. Will be removed in 6.0. Use metadataTypeName 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CwObject.metadataType
          As of 5.1.12. Will be removed in 6.0. Use metadataTypeName 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CwObject.next
          as of 5.1. DataObjectList content can now be accessed directly by index, such as dataObjectList[i]. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.DataObjectList.start
          As of 5.1. Use list[0] 
com.conceptwave.scripting.DataObjectList.totalSize
          as of 5.1. Use size() 
 

Deprecated Methods
com.conceptwave.scripting.Order._delete()
          As of 4.1-SP2. Use 'deleteOrder'. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.DataObjectList.addAfter(CwObject, CwObject)
          As of 5.1. Use add(index, object) 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.addBMCounter(String, Boolean, Boolean)
          As of 5.0. Will be removed in 6.0. Use 'AddBenchmarkCounter' method in the AVM object 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Catalog.browse(String, Object[])
          as of 5.1. SP2 Use runQuery API instead. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Basket.canAdd(Object, Date)
          This method is deprecated and should not be used anymore. There is no alternative. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.createHTMLPage(String, String)
          As of 5.1. Will be removed in version 6. Use proper velocity UI methods 
com.conceptwave.scripting.interpreter.failEquals(Object, Object, String)
          As of 6.0. To be removed in 7.0. Use assertNotEquals instead 
com.conceptwave.scripting.interpreter.failNotEquals(Object, Object, String)
          As of 6.0. To be removed in 7.0. Use assertEquals instead 
com.conceptwave.scripting.interpreter.failNotSame(Object, Object, String)
          As of 6.0. To be removed in 7.0. Use assertSame instead 
com.conceptwave.scripting.interpreter.failSame(Object, Object, String)
          As of 6.0. To be removed in 7.0. Use assertNotSame instead 
com.conceptwave.scripting.AbstractAVM.getAVM()
          As of 5.1. Use the scope variable 'theAVM' 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.getBMCounterProperty(String, Integer)
          As of 5.0. Will be removed in 6.0. Use the methods of the BenchmarkCounter object. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.AVM.getCache(String)
          As of 5.1. Will be removed in 6.0. Not needed and not supported. Use the predefined cache names: theDocumentCache, theOrderCache, theResourceCache and theInterfaceDataCache 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.getCachedResource(String, String, String)
          As of 5.1. Will be removed in 6.0. Use theResourceCache.getResource API. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogHierarchyNode.getCode()
          Replaced by accessing code property directly. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.getConfigPassword(String)
          As of 5.0 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.getCurrentApplication()
          As of 5.1. Use the interpreter variable "theApp". 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.getCurrentContextObject()
          Please use variable "context" under application 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.getCurrentForm()
          getCurrentForm() uses old metadata format. Use getTheCurrentForm() to get string in the current metadata format. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Process.getDataObject(String, Boolean, Long)
          As of 4.1 SP2. Use getCachedOrder method 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogItemCharge.getDiscountTargetCharge()
          will be removed in 6, please replace with getTargetChargeOfChargeType 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.getElementLabel(String, String)
          Metadata script logic should not be dependant on element labels. Please rework metadata logic. If rework is difficult or impossible, please use the alternative API Document.getFieldLabel 
com.conceptwave.scripting.UserProfile.getHttpResponseHeaderMap()
          As of 6.0. Use UserProfile.getHttpResponseHeaderNames() and UserProfile.getHttpResponseHeaderValue() 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogItem.getItemAssociations(String[], Object)
          As of 5.1, will be removed in 6.0, use getAssociations API instead. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogItem.getItemAssociationsByAssociationType(String, Boolean)
          as of 5.1, will be removed in 6.0. Replaced by getAssociations API 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogItem.getItemAttributesByAssociationType(String)
          as in 5.1, will be removed in 6.0. Use getItemAttributes API. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogItem.getItemCode()
          will be removed in 6, can be replaced by accessing code property directly. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogItem.getItemRelations(String[], Boolean)
          will be removed in 6, can be replaced by getAssociations (String[] types) 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogItem.getItemType()
          will be removed in 6, can be replaced by accessing type property directly. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.getLibraries()
          As of 5.0. Will be removed in version 6. No replacement provided 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.getMetadataLabel()
          As of 5.0. Will be removed in version 6. Use getMetadataDescription method. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.getMetadataNameByIndex(Integer)
          As of 5.1.12. Will be removed in 6.0. Use getMetadataFullNameByIndex 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.getMetadataVersionNumber()
          As of 5.0. Will be removed in version 6. Use getMetadataVersion method. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CWCache.getMostRecentElementIds(Integer)
          As of 5.1. Will be removed in 6.0. No substitution provided. The API is not needed after introducing the cache reload functionality 
com.conceptwave.scripting.UserProfile.getMsgLogId()
          use getMsgLogDoc() 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogAttributeAssociation.getName()
          This method returns the item attribute code instead of name. Replaced by accessing code property directly. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogItemAttachment.getName()
          This method returns the item attachment code instead of name. Replaced by accessing code property directly. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogItemCharge.getName()
          This method returns the item charge code instead of name. Replaced by accessing code property directly. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogItemDescription.getName()
          This method returns the item description code instead of name. Replaced by accessing code property directly. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogItemGroup.getName()
          This method returns the item group code instead of name. Replaced by accessing code property directly. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogItemImage.getName()
          This method returns the item image code instead of name. Replaced by accessing code property directly. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CatalogItemItem.getName()
          This method returns the item relation code instead of name. Replaced by accessing code property directly. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Process.getOrderFromCache(String, Boolean, Long)
          As of 4.1 SP3. Use getCachedOrder method 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CwInterfacePort.getRetryCount()
          As of 6.0. Will be removed in next release. Never implemented. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.UserProfile.getSelectTasks()
          As of 3.1. No substitution provided 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.getSemaphore()
          As of 4.1. Use getSemaphore method of the AVM object. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.getSessionValues()
          as of 5.2. Will be removed in 6.0 
com.conceptwave.scripting.UserProfile.getTakeTasks()
          As of 3.1. No substitution provided 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Date.getYear()
          getYear is no longer used and has been replaced by the getFullYear method. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CwObject.hasMethod(String)
          as of 5.1. Use Global.isMethodDefined(). 
com.conceptwave.scripting.AbstractAVM.hasNamespace(String)
          Use the API AVM.getMetadataObject(name) 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Catalog.invokeDatabaseExport(String, Integer, Boolean, Boolean, Date, Boolean, Boolean, Object[], Object[])
          As of 6.0. Use command line or UI catalog export. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Catalog.invokeDatabaseImport(String, Boolean, Date, Boolean, String, String)
          As of 6.0. Use command line or UI catalog export. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.invokeFinder()
          As of 4.1. Will be removed in version 6. Use Funder.runFinder method. Note that Funder.runFinder method does not return array. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.isCancelledRequest()
          As of 5.1. This functionality is not supported any more. Returns always false. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Document.isFormVisible(String)
          Removed as of 5.1. No substitution provided 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.leftPad(String, Integer, String)
          as of 4.1. Use method 'leftPad(int length, String fill)' of the string object. The string object method returns null instead of throwing exception if the 'fill' parameter is invalid 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CWCache.loadElements(String[])
          As of 5.1. Will be removed in 6.0. No substitution provided. The API is not needed after introducing the cache reload functionality 
com.conceptwave.scripting.DataObjectList.loadPage(Integer)
          As of 5.1. Paging is no longer supported/required 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Document.mapDocToDoc(Document, String, Boolean, Boolean, Boolean)
          to be removed in 5.2. Use mapTo(). 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Document.mapDocToStructure(Object, String, Boolean)
          to be removed in 5.2. Use mapTo(). 
com.conceptwave.scripting.DataStructure.mapStructureToDoc(Object, String, Boolean)
          to be removed in 5.2. Use mapTo(). 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.println(Object)
          as of 4.1. Use the interpreter function 'debugPrintln' 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Process.putDataObject(String, Order)
          As of 4.1 SP2. Use putOrderInCache method. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Process.releaseDataObject(String, Long, Boolean)
          As of 4.1 SP2. Use releaseOrderInCache method. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.releaseSemaphore()
          As of 4.1. Use releaseSemaphore method of the AVM object 
com.conceptwave.scripting.DataObjectList.removeAfter(CwObject)
          As of 5.1 use the API delete(index) 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.removeBMCounter(String)
          As of 5.0. Will be removed in 6.0. Use 'removeBenchmarkCounter' method in the AVM object 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.rightPad(String, Integer, String)
          as of 4.1. Use method 'rightPad(int length, String fill)' of the string object. The string object method returns null instead of throwing exception if the 'fill' parameter is invalid 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CwObject.runAttributeScript()
          As of release 4.1. Will be deleted in release 6.0. Use runScript instead. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.runFinder(String, String, Document)
          As of 4.1. Use Finder.runFinder method. Note that the Finder method uses the current finder search document if the search document parameter is null. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.runGlobalScript(String, Boolean, Object[])
          As of 5.0 Use runGlobalScriptExt 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.runScript(String, String, Object, Object[])
          As of 5.1 SP15. User the top level function runscript(). 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.selectDBDocument(String, Document)
          As of 4.1. Use 'Document.readDoc' 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.sendEmail(String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, Object, Object)
          As of 5.2. Use Global.sendEmailMessage(). 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.sendEmailDocumentAttachment(String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, Object, String[], Object)
          As of 5.2. Use Global.sendEmailMessage(). 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.sendEmailFileAttachment(String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, Object, String[], Object)
          As of 5.2. Use Global.sendEmailMessage(). 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Process.sendSignalToProcess(String, Process, Long)
          As of version 4.1. Use the instance method sendSignalFromProcess or the static method sendSignal. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.set42CatalogMode()
          Only for Videotron in the 5.x stream Sets the 4.2 compatibility mode for the Catalog. In this mode the JavaScript interpreter recognizes the script notation used in 4.2 Catalog scripts. This API should be called in the system initialization script before any other Catalog API is called 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.setBMCounterProperty(String, Integer, Integer)
          As of 5.0. Will be removed in 6.0. Use the corresponding API of the BenchmarkCounter object 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.setCurrentContextObject(CwObject, String)
          Please use variable "context" under application 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CwInterfacePort.setMessagePriority(Integer)
          As of 6.0. Will be removed in next release. Never implemented. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.UserProfile.setMsgLogData(String, String, String, Long)
          Use setMsgLogDoc(msgLogDoc) to set a new doc into the context. To update the message log entry from AFTER the last external interface call in this context, use getMsgLogDoc() combined with Document.save() if you wish to update the record in the database. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.CwInterfacePort.setRetryLimit(Integer)
          As of 6.0. Will be removed in next release. Never implemented. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.setSemaphore()
          As of 4.1. Use setSemaphore method of the AVM object 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.setUserLanguage(String)
          As of 4.1. Use 'UserProfile.setUserLanguage' 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Date.setYear(Integer)
          setYear is no longer used and has been replaced by the setFullYear method. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.showLicense()
          as of 6.0 Use #getLicenses(CwfContext) instead 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Process.startSubProcess(String, String, Document)
            
com.conceptwave.scripting.Basket.storeInBulk()
          As of 5.1. SP 12. Please use the order save API or the basket storeInDB API 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.storeInEventLog(Integer, String, String, String, Boolean)
          As of 5.1. Use logError and/or logDebug APIs 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.stringEndsWith(String, String)
          as of 4.1. Use 'endsWith(String suffix)' of the string object 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.stringStartsWith(String, String)
          as of 4.1. Use 'startsWith(String prefix)' of the string object 
com.conceptwave.scripting.DataObjectList.toArray()
          As of 5.1 data object list supports access to contents directly by index: dataObjectList[i] updated: dataObjectList[i] = object; removed dataObjectList.remove(i) or inserted: add(index, object) 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Document.toCSV(String)
          to be removed in 5.2 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Date.toGMTString()
          toGMTString is no longer used and has been replaced by the toUTCString method. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.Global.trim(String)
          as of 4.1.SP2 Use method 'trim()' of the string object. 
com.conceptwave.scripting.interpreter.verifyFalse(Boolean, String)
          As of 6.0. To be removed in 7.0. Use assertFalse instead 
com.conceptwave.scripting.interpreter.verifyTrue(Boolean, String)
          As of 6.0. To be removed in 7.0. Use assertTrue instead
